Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Give me your gun and radio.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: My argument is not with you.  BOURNE smashes the radio and takes the gun.  BOURNE exits...

Speaker: black screen
Dialogue: A TITLE fades in --  THE BOURNE ULTIMATUM SUPER:    Six Weeks Later

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: We think that's Bourne hitting him on the head and then--

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Who's "she?"

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: His girlfriend, Marie. She was killed in India three weeks ago.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: A dirty section chief in league with a corrupt Russian Billionaire commits suicide when confronted by Jason Bourne. You couldn't make this stuff up.  You watched this happen?

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Bourne's last confirmed location is Moscow, three days ago?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Right.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: So what does he do now?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I think he's looking for something he hasn't found.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Like what?     What's he after?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I'm not sure. Maybe he hasn't gotten his memory back yet.  Not all of it.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Pam, what I need to know is, what kind of a threat is he to us?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: If he just wanted to hurt us he could have sent this tape to CNN.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Maybe he still will. Maybe he gave it to you because he wants to throw you in the opposite direction of his real plan. I don't know. I just know my number one rule is "the only way to stay safe is to assume the worst."   As far as I'm concerned Bourne is a serious threat until proven otherwise.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: What connects the dots? Is it Treadstone?

Speaker: daniels
Dialogue: Turn off that tape recorder.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Where is my sister?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: She's dead. She was killed.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: I knew it was going to end this way. It was always going to end this way...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I didn't believe that.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Why did she die?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: She was shot. A man came for me.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: And then you killed him.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Now what?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Someone started all this...and I'm going to find them.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Who started Treadstone?

Speaker: ellatrache
Dialogue: They're still looking for you. You are taking a big risk coming here.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Just tell me what I want to know!

Speaker: ellatrache
Dialogue: I just provided them weapons.    I don't know who started--

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: You know something.   Tell me where to start looking.

Speaker: ellatrache
Dialogue: There's a journalist in London. Simon Ross. He seems to know a lot about you.   He has a source inside the program. Someone there from the beginning. What should I tell them if they contact me?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: They give me the name I want, or I burn their entire house down to get it.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: ...This is big -- a skein of lies -- you pull at it and it just keeps coming -- I'll fill you in when I get home. And it's not finished, either.  They're calling it `Blackbriar'.  Follow this SEQUENCE as...

Speaker: supervisor
Dialogue: Okay, send it to CRI right now.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: We tracked the phone. Registered to a London reporter named Simon Ross. He works at the Guardian newspaper.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: You tracking him?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Yeah, thanks Mike. We have a survey team covering him at work...and a sneak and peek's on their way to his apartment.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Well, who talked to him? How did he find out about Blackbriar?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: We don't know, we pulled his background and ran a cross check on any known anomalies, but we've come up with nothing. But, I think if we follow Ross, we are going to be able...

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Right. Ross is easy. I want the source.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Is that all?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I want rendition protocols and I want the asset put on standby, just in case.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: People, listen up, this is a full priority situation

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Jimmy, give me Ross's profile on one.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Our target is a British national, Simon Ross, a reporter. I want all his phones, his blackberry, his apartment, his car, bank accounts, credit cards, travel patterns...I want to know what he's going to think before he does. Every dirty little secret he has. And most of all, we want the name and real time location of his source.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Where's my picture please?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: That's too long.

Speaker: editor
Dialogue: So how do we know he's not spinning for someone?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: There's more. He was scared.

Speaker: editor
Dialogue: Scared of what?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Blackbriar.

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: Sorry, a call for you.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Who is it?

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: Won't give hie name.

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: He's on my line...

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Why aren't we hearing this?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: That's a hard line, Jimmy, why don't we have it?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: We have his line, sir, but he's not on it.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Who is this?  BOURNE  This is Jason Bourne.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Okay, he is on the move.   Target is mobile.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Okay, people, look sharp, give me eyeballs on the street.

Speaker: survey one
Dialogue: Subject is on the move. Go mobile One and Two.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Where's that audio on the street? I want to know where he's going...

Speaker: mobile 2
Dialogue: We have the subject confirmed.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Where is he heading?

Speaker: mobile 2
Dialogue: Waterloo Station.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Hello?  BOURNE  Don't ask questions. Just listen...

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: What's he doing? I thought we blocked his cell? Who the hell is he talking to???

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Jimmy, I need that phone!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Activate the asset.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Sir, we haven't yet become operational --

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I said activate the asset.   I want options.

Speaker: survey two
Dialogue: What's the ROE on this one?  PANNING TO REVEAL

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Okay, who's the guy in the blue hood?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Okay, there, he's talking to the guy with the hood. Take them down.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Watch that bus! The bus! -- don't lose them! Stay triangular and don't get blocked.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Take the footbridge. Go to the West Entrance. I'll meet you at the newsstand.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: No, no, look...Ross is not on the bus.   Split up the team -- get the guy on the bus and send someone to stay on Ross.

Speaker: agent one
Dialogue: You. On the floor. Down.

Speaker: agent two
Dialogue: Driver, stop the bus!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I don't like this. Patch me through to Met surveillance.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Why do you know so much about me?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: The article. You talked to someone from Treadstone. Someone there at the beginning.  What's his name?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: I can't tell you that.... Who's following me?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Whoever they are it's trouble.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Are they Blackbriar?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Blackbriar, what's Blackbriar?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: I don't know. I heard the name this morning for the first time. Whatever it is, my source said it started with you.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: What? What are you talking about?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Look, just help me get away from these people...and we can talk more...we can--

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: We have to move.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Answer your phone.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: He's got to be close. Seal the entrances.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Has she seen me?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Not yet. Dip left past the photo kiosk.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Are we clear?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Clear. News kiosk. Straight ahead.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Straight toward me.     Bin man?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Negative.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: He's got a gun.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Negative.    Keep straight ahead.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: We're losing him! We cannot afford to lose him!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Waterloo concourse. Subject heading east.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Get into cover. Now!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: 64H             What's the status of the asset?                     64H

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: In place in one minute.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Alright, I want to take him now. Get him out of there and have the asset cover it.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Target moving towards the stores.

Speaker: another voice
Dialogue: Asset in play. ETA thirty seconds. All exits covered.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Keep moving...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: INSIDE!

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Service doorway -- Now!

Speaker: techy 2
Dialogue: Store.   Three means of egress.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Close him down...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Keep moving.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, that's Jason Bourne.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Maybe he's the source?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: It doesn't matter, the asset now has 2 targets. Take them both out.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I'm going to get you to safety but you have to stay calm do exactly what I say.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Sure, okay.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: No, listen to me: Exactly what I say this time. Understand?

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Stay here while I look for an escape.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: No, stay behind that door.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: There. That silver door. Bourne's behind that door?

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Confirmed.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Okay, pull the agents back and give Bourne's location to the asset.

Speaker: scope pov
Dialogue: The door comes open slightly, but from this angle Paz doesn't have a clean shot at his target .

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Don't move until I tell you.

Speaker: ross
Dialogue: I'm going to go for it.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: No, No not now.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Oh...shit...

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: What about Bourne?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Get him out of there - NOW!

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Hello.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: It's Vosen. We have a situation.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Sparkling. And a "Heart-Healthy" omelet with goat cheese and peppers.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: You're late. Traffic?

Speaker: waiter
Dialogue: Ma'am?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Nothing for me.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I'm buying.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: When the Director called, it was suggested we bring you on--

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Suggested?  Are you sure it was just a suggestion?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Funny how different things look depending on where you sit. I look at this as doing a favor for you. Giving you an opportunity to complete some unfinished business.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Meaning?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Jason Bourne.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Bourne's finished.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Really?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: It was finished the moment I realized I was chasing him for something he didn't do.   The case is closed.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: So what do you make of this?  French intel picked up Bourne meeting Pierre Elattrache on Tuesday. He threatened to burn our house down if you didn't tell him who started Treadstone. That's a big problem, wouldn't you agree?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: This doesn't feel like Bourne to me.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Why's it so hard for you to believe?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Probably because it's coming from you, Noah.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Lets try and be adults okay? We all thought he was done, off the grid. But Bourne's back. Maybe he's a threat. We both want the same thing here.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: So what happened at Waterloo?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: We have a leak. Bourne showed up in our surveillance. We had very little time to react.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: And the reporter ended up dead?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Bourne saw us coming.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: So what was he doing?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: The real question is how you managed to get in a fire fight in the middle of a public train station.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Don't second guess an operation from an armchair, Pam. It's not fair.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I'm going to the office now. I'll make my own introductions.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: This is Pamela Landy. She's gonna be quarterbacking our search effort. I think what we oughta do, just to get started, let's go around the room, say who you are and what your spec is.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Let's do names later.  Anybody.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Status?   Wounded?   Armed?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Where are your grids coming from?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You have an Echelon package?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Why isn't it on?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: For what?  That would mean now.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I think we can be pretty certain that Bourne's not your source then?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: How?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Ross's call to his editor, where he said he just met the source on Blackbriar, took place just after his flight landed. His met his source in Turin.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: So?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: So, what, Bourne met Ross for breakfast and then, at noon the same day Bourne calls Ross to demand a meet at Waterloo?

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Maybe they were even on the same flight?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Cross check the secure cell phone usage of everyone with Blackbriar SCI clearance against all calls in and out of Turin during the morning Ross was there

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: The guy you're after is a CIA operative with clearance above Top Secret.   He was committing treason by talking to Ross.   Do you really think, while doing that, he used a cell phone he knows we can track?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Do you have a better idea?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Yeah, I'd look at all the people whose cell phones were switched off the entire period Ross was in Turin.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Do it Jimmy.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I mean if your people use their cell phones as much as mine do, the list should be pretty small

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Now check everything in Ross's apartment against those names. Look for common patterns, look for -

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Initials .....Bring that up on main.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Neal Daniels.   He's Station Chief in Madrid now, isn't he?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Jesus Christ.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Call the RSO at the Embassy and have them take Daniels into custody if he's there.   If he's not, get a grab team to the Calle Norte safe house. Send them in heavy and tell them we'll assist with entry.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: "Heavy?" Daniels isn't--

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I'm worried about Bourne. If he's not Ross's source, then he must be after Ross's source -- just like us.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Team two, ETA Callee Norte?

Speaker: hammond
Dialogue: We're in.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Okay, put it live.

Speaker: hammond
Dialogue: Alarm's down.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: That has to be Bourne.

Speaker: hammond
Dialogue: Safe's cleaned out.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Shit...    Track the passports.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Goddamn it! Get a back-up team in there!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: How long till back-up arrives?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: How long?  Stop! Hang on. I have an idea...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: What are you doing here?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: I was posted here after Berlin.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Where's Daniels?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Who is this?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Nicky, I need to do an ID challenge first. Code in: "Sparrow."

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: Response: "Everest".

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Nicky, this is Noah Vosen. How long have you been on site?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: We have two officers on site. Are you in contact with them?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Is there any sign of Daniels?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Nicky, this is Pam Landy. We have reason to believe there is a connection between Neal Daniels and Jason Bourne.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: No, some people are convinced he's still a threat. I disagree but to find out I need to talk to him.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Hold on Nicky.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: What are you doing? You know Bourne's probably listening.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: How long till back up arrives.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: They know you're here.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: How long do I have?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: Three minutes...

Speaker: delta dude
Dialogue: 2 minutes to safehouse.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: My car's outside.    I know where Daniels is.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: You "disagree" he's a threat? He just took out two more of my men. Not to mention his ultimatum to Ellatrache?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: The only way this has a happy ending, Noah, is if we find a way to bring Bourne in voluntarily.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: He wants revenge, Pam. The only realistic way to deal with this is to eliminate the threat.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Okay, where is Daniels headed?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: 8 o'clock this morning, he wired $100,000. to a numbered bank account in Tangier.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Okay, Tangier is about 300 miles away, we can make the morning ferry.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: And then what?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: They're coming.

Speaker: spanish police
Dialogue: Manos Arriba! Manos Arriba!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Issue a standing kill order on Jason Bourne, effective immediately.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: We lost Bourne.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: You still think he's after Daniels?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Yeah. Nicky's just the means. But if we find Daniels, we'll find Bourne.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Daniels knows way too much. Daniels knows everything. We can't let them meet.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I'll take care of it.

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Good.  And fill Hirsch in.     Just in case.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: What are you after, Jason?   Why are you looking for Daniels?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Do you know who this is?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: That's Daniels.  I don't know who that is.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I have to get back to the beginning...or I'll never be free of this.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: Who is he?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I think he started Treadstone.    I remember meeting him.   I remember the first day...  Daniels brought me to him.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: An initiation...I guess...

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: Jason...that wasn't some one-off initiation. Daniels said they did that to you over and over again.   That's how they...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Why are you helping me?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: It was difficult for me...with you.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Noah Vosen.

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: They tracked Daniels' passport to a hotel in Tangier. They're holding up a bank transfer he made to keep him in place while they move an asset in from Casablanca.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Since when do you have authorization for lethal action against Daniels?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Since he cleaned out a Blackbriar safe and fled to Morocco!

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: So grab him--

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I don't have the people on the ground to do that and I'm not going to risk that file falling into the wrong hands.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: What's going on?    What's Daniels got?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: What's he got? He ran all of Blackbriar's operations in Southern Europe and North Africa.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I think the world's well aware we have a rendition and lethal action capability at this point, Noah.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: For Christ's sake, Pam, he's got our entire playbook. Names, dates, ghost sites, how we train our assets.....

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You still don't have the authority to kill him.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Oh, yes I do, Pam.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: That's what makes us special. No red tape. No more getting badguys in our sights and then watching them escape while we wait for some bureaucrat to issue the order.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You just decide? No oversight. No checks and balances.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Come on, Pam, you've seen the raw intel. You know how real the threat is.    We can't afford to have our hands tied like that anymore.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: It's Pamela Landy for him. Would you tell him it's urgent?

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: Tell her I'm unreachable.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Give me the subject's location.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Get an elevation and a floor plan, tic-tac-toe. Locate the room. Give the asset Daniels's location and the route between Daniel's hotel and the bank.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Do we have that room yet?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Get the hotel's trunk line. Run all calls through here with an iso on 117  TIGHT ON COMPUTER MONITOR: DESH'S ICON STOPS MOVING.

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Sir, the asset is acquiring the materials.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: His location's being blocked.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Now they found Daniels, do you know where he is?

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: They'll get one of the operatives to terminate him.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Find out who.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Tell him you're going to meet him and that you have a new phone for him.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: If you stop Desh they'll just get someone else.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: We're not going to stop him. We're going to follow him. He'll take us right to Daniels.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Find out why.

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Sir, the asset is on the move, in route to subject.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Sir, we have an unauthorized breach. Someone with active system knowledge has penetrated out protocols. Information was passed to the asset at 14.11.  The trace is confirmed and valid. It comes from a computer belonging to Nicky Parsons.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Where did the course deviation occur?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: That's where Parson's is.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: When we're finished with Daniels send the asset after her. We find Parsons, we find Bourne.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Not now.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Now.   I want to know what's going on.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Not now.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I'm asking on what basis you're continuing this operation.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: On the basis that Nicky Parsons has compromised a covert operation. She is up to her neck in it.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: This is about Daniels, not Nicky!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: She has betrayed us!

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You don't know the circumstances!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: She's in league with Jason Bourne for Chrissake!

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You don't have the authority to kill her or Bourne!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Yes, I do Pam, it's right here and it's legal.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: She's one of our own.   You start down this path...where does it end?!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: It ends when we've won.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Notify the asset of the additional target.

Speaker: bryan
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Have the bank release the funds.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Alright, we need to be dead.    You need to code that in.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I want to be sure. Have the station chief in Rabat confirm the deaths and do a sub-rosa check...And keep and eye on Landy.

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: The hub just got word Bourne and Nicky are dead.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Confirmed?

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Not yet.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Get me a copy of Bourne's personnel file.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I can see all their faces. But I can't remember any names....

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I was starting to remember who they were...in India...with Marie.

Speaker: nicky
Dialogue: It's just going to lead to more killing, Jason. Are you sure you want that?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I've killed people and I've tried to apologize for what I've done, for what I am. None of it makes it better...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: They're going to come for you again. You are going to have to run now.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: It gets easier.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Station chief in Rabat just called, they found a body. Bourne?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Desh.

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Pam, You need to see this.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: They don't know.

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: No, if they knew Vosen wouldn't be in his office right now.

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Maybe he's trying to communicate with you.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Maybe we should communicate back. Because I think I know what Bourne's looking for.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Pamela Landy.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I hear you're still looking for me.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Bourne?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: I guess I owe you an apology.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Wait.     Wait.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: David Webb. That's your real name.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Why the hell did she give him that?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Why don't you come in, and we'll talk about it?  Bourne?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Get some rest, Pam.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: He's got line of sight on us!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: ...This is a national security emergency. We have an imminent threat.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Jason Bourne is alive and at large in New York City. We believe in one thousand yards of this building. I want an immediate twelve block lockdown of the area. Send a FLASH message to Langley, prep for local backup assistance.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Landy just left the building.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Check Landy's phone.   Is she using it?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Nothing?   No calls since Bourne-- ?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: What the hell do you mean we can't read it?

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Working on it--

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Are we on Landy?

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Six men.   More on the way.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I want that goddamn text.   We need to get out in front of her!

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Seconds...

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Surround it. Anyone not on Landy goes to Tudor City. Now!  Get the trucks. We're going mobile.

Speaker: agent 3
Dialogue: Copy, we're going to take a left at 41st. One block, settle at the corner.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Get the map up.

Speaker: agent 4
Dialogue: It's a bad place to pick, it's too exposed.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: He wouldn't have chosen it if he didn't have a reason.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: As soon as you have eyes on Landy, I want to know.

Speaker: agent 3
Dialogue: Okay, here we go.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Copy that, I see her.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Noah Vosen.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: How did you get this number?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: No, I guess not. But if it's me you want to talk to maybe we can arrange a meet.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: In my office.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: We'd be having this conversation face-to-face.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: This is a code ten abort, I want everybody back in the vehicles this is a code ten abort! Back to the vehicles immediately, back to CRI immediately.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Bourne got into your safe!

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: What just happened?

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Bourne got into Vosen's safe.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: What?!

Speaker: cronin
Dialogue: Where to?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: 415 East 71st Street.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: ...I want the entire building searched. Every room. Every hallway. Every closet. Every goddamm airduct. Do you understand? I want him found!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Lethal force is authorized.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Tell them again!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Take him out!

Speaker: cri agent
Dialogue: Ho-ly shit!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: He did what?!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Get NYPD backup! And FBI, DEA, any other federal assets we can draft!

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: 10-13. Shots fired. Officer down. Port Authority parking lot. Level four.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: The asset lost Bourne.   We lost him.

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Sir, this may be nothing but, look at Bourne's birthday.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: What about it?

Speaker: tech
Dialogue: Well, Landy told Bourne his birthday was 4/15/71 so...

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: Everything stops.

Speaker: cri agent
Dialogue: Landy gave Bourne a false birthday. Wills thinks it's a code.

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: --hang on -- wait -- Seventy First Street? Like what? Like York and First?

Speaker: wills
Dialogue: She gave him the facility.     She gave him--

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: We're already on our way. Turn the teams around. Bring them in behind me.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Not long.    Get out of there.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: No.   I'm going to stay.

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Are you crazy, he'll--

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: He'll come to the training wing. That's what he knows. I'll keep him in play until you arrive.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: They'll kill you for giving me this place.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: 4/15/71 isn't much of a code. My guess is Vosen's already on his way.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Why'd you do it?

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: This isn't us, David. What they turned you into, what they're doing with Blackbriar... This has to stop.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Then stop it. Everything you need is in there.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: David... Come in with me. It's better if we do this together.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: This is where it started for me, this is where it ends.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: Oh, my God...  --A third page, more photos, no "terminated" on these. Future victims. "US citizen" stamped next to each one...

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Landy! Right there!    She's got Bourne's backpack!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I'll find Landy. You get to the training wing and get Bourne!

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: Do you know who I am?  Where's your security room?

Speaker: vosen
Dialogue: I want to see all your footage for the last three minutes.

Speaker: landy
Dialogue: You better get a good lawyer.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: Put the gun down. I wouldn't be here if I didn't want to talk.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I've spent three years running. Three years trying to find out who I was.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You still don't have it all back, do you? You haven't filled in all the pieces?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Let's start with the moment you found out I wouldn't execute Wombosi. The amnesia wasn't the issue, it was the fact that I didn't pull the trigger....

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: One lapse meant your conditioning had failed.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: It was always you, behind Conklin, behind Abbott.... They were just following orders.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: I'm unarmed, Jason.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: "David." I'm David Webb.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You were David Webb, but not anymore.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Why me?   Why did you pick me?

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You really don't remember, do you?  You picked us, Jason.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: What does that mean?

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You volunteered.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You volunteered right here.... You didn't even blink, Jason. You just handed me these...

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You were a soldier ready to serve his country. Just like thousands of others, except you were a prodigy with languages...and a perfect shot.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: You said I'd be saving American lives. Instead you just turned me into a killer.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You could have left at any time. And you knew exactly what it meant for you if you chose to stay.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: When we're finished with you, you'll no longer be David Webb.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I'll be whoever you need me to be, sir.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: Stop running from the truth, Jason. You chose to come here! You chose to stay! And no matter how much you want to forget it...eventually you're going to have to face how you chose, right there, to become Jason Bourne!

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Who is he?

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: We've been through that.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: What did he do?

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: It doesn't matter.  You came to us. You volunteered. You said you'd do anything it takes to save American lives. You're not a liar are you? Or too weak to see this through? This is it. Let go of David Webb. Will you give yourself to this program?

Speaker: kramer
Dialogue: He's ready. Send him to Operations.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: Do you remember now?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I remember. I remember everything.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: You can't outrun what you did, Jason. You made yourself into who you are.

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: I'm done running.  That's why I'm here. To end you, to shut this down. I'm no longer Jason Bourne.

Speaker: hirsch
Dialogue: So now you're going to kill me?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: No. You don't deserve the star they give you on the wall at Langley.

Speaker: paz
Dialogue: Why didn't you take the shot?

Speaker: bourne
Dialogue: Do you even know why you're trying to kill me? Look at what they make you give.
